name: Dr Looi Wen Shen Radiation Oncologist for Proton Therapy and Radiotherapy

reviews.text: I'm extremely grateful for the exceptional care and treatment we received from Dr. Looi Wen Shen, Radiation Oncologist. Her professionalism, compassion, and expertise in proton therapy and radiotherapy are truly commendable. The entire team was supportive and understanding throughout my niece treatment journey. The service is top notch. The staff was friendly, professional, and welcoming. The doctor is incredibly knowledgeable, care, and kind. The place is very comfortable. I had a memorable and unforgettable moment here!

Our treatments experience with Dr.Looi & Teams were exeptional . Dr.Looi , he is very welcoming and professional. He always listen &  we were given clear and helpful explanations. Thank you so much Dr.Looi for your dedication & care . We are trully appreciate it .
